scripts.build-android-production: rm -rf android && eas build --platform android --profile production --local --clear-cache
scripts.build-android-preview: rm -rf android && eas build --platform android --profile preview --local --clear-cache
scripts.build-android-dev: rm -rf android && eas build --platform android --profile development --local --clear-cache
scripts.build-ios-preview: rm -rf ios && eas build --platform ios --profile preview --local --clear-cache
scripts.build-ios-preview-cloud-submit: rm -rf ios && eas build --platform ios --profile preview --auto-submit --clear-cache
scripts.build-ios-production-local: rm -rf ios && eas build --platform ios --profile production --local --clear-cache
scripts.build-ios-production-cloud-submit: rm -rf ios && eas build --platform ios --profile production --auto-submit --clear-cache
scripts.build-ios-dev-submit: rm -rf ios && eas build --platform ios --profile development --local --clear-cache && eas submit --platform ios --profile development
scripts.build-ios-dev-cloud-submit: rm -rf ios && eas build --platform ios --profile development --auto-submit --clear-cache
